column2: "...No, that's not right."
"...Something's different..."
"Hm?! Who goes there?!"
"Ohhh, it's just you, <%me>."

"Hehe, you're really good at hiding your presence.
You're something else, that's for sure."
"Why're you all the way out here?"
"Were you practicing something?"
"Oh, this is a daily thing for me."

"This place is perfect for
independent training."
"Practice...? Well, I guess it could be called practice, yeah."
"...It's dance rehearsal."

"I say rehearsal, but my dance
instructor isn't around anymore."

"What my family has is
the Power of \"Song\"."

"However, that power isn't something
that improves with singing alone."

"When song and dance becomes one,
that's when its true potential manifests."
"My mother taught me that."

"No matter how good my singing gets, this
dance is something I struggle with."

"During my rehearsals, it's what my
mother was most often critical of."

"When I quit singing in public, I also
stopped dancing for a long time."

"Now that I'm singing once again, I can't
afford to cut corners with my dancing either."

"That's why I come here to rehearse
whenever I can find some time."
"...So, now that I've told you, uh..."

"I don't really feel like it's ready
to be shown to other people."

"When my routine is more polished, I'd
love to hear your thoughts on it, though."
"Unless, you want to dance with me?"
"Dancing isn't really..."
"If it was combat training..."
"Hehehe, I'm joking."

"Hm. Well, that's an offer
I would be interested in."

"However, let's save that
for another occasion."

"Before I show my dances or my songs in front of
everyone, I want to make sure my routine is polished."

"When that time comes, you and
the girls should come watch too."
"I'll see you later."

"...Don't you come peeking
from any rocky shadows, now."
